title: Changing the directory where e-mail messages are stored
content:
Hi, I just installed Thunderbird on Fedora Linux and I tried to change the default directory where Thunderbird stores e-mail boxes for each e-mail account.

I managed to do the change, however the directory absolute path which is shown in the local directory field is different from what I just changed, even though the change has been successful and I can see the content of my inbox. For example the shown path is 

                             "/run/flatpak/doc/lad91b03/mailserver-name.org"

(this absolute path doesn't exist) and the real path is something like: 

                         /home/username/Documents/Mail/AppData/Roaming/Profiles/...../mailserver-name.org"

This doesn't happen on Windows...
creator: sinergy

title: Setting up a gmail account in Thunderbird
content: I am trying to install a Google account into Thunderbird. I'm in advanced configuration and hit the retry button. The error message is that Thunderbird did not find the account. Please help.

title: Can't access inbox
content:
unable to shift from 'show unread' to inbox. I quit TB to see if it was a temporary prob, but no change. Sidebar shows 168 in inbox. But at bottom of sidebar under unread folders shows 8. If not showing unread, but all messages, the larger number is prob accurate. Clicking on inbox does nothing.

I've just returned to TB after a few month break on Apple mail. I've always preffered TB, but things seemed to disappear, so I switched. But eventually Apple mail had at least as many probs, and I prefer TB. Hope you can help. thx.

title: unable to unsubscribe
content:
I am receiving multiple emails (50 a day) from different advertising site using the same email address. when I enter unsubscribe and the reply is "email not registered"

VacHold Pro <security-noreply@linkedin.com> ProTabletX <security-noreply@linkedin.com> Manpower Male Enhancement <security-noreply@linkedin.com>

I have tried blocking the email as well, but that didn't help Please advise asap. Thank you

title: Thunderbird 128.v. - Failed To Send Out Digital Signed Emails - Error Message Shows Signing Certificate Not Found
content:
Hello,

I have been using Thunderbird 091 and 102 version to send out digital signed Emails with the help of a pki usb token. Lately, I have downloaded the newer version 128 and to perform the same task by using the same token with the same certificates in, however it failed to do so by showing up an error message when I tried to send out the digital signed Emails. The error message indicates that the signing certificate can't be found or expired, but nothing has been changed except for the newer version of the thunderbird.

Please let me know how can I fix the issue.

Thank you!
creator: lois12

title: Connecting to a Gmail account in Thunderbird
content:
I've been using Thunderbird to handle my email accounts for a long time (years). My Gmail connection was misbehaving, so I deleted the account on Thunderbird, verified that everything was still there by using the google.com/gmail interface (which works fine), then tried to recreate (reconnect) the Gmail account in Thunderbird. Followed the routine "Set Up Another Account", "Email", entered a name, gmail address, and password, then "Continue". Thunderbird looks up a configuration, finds Gmail, and it all looks normal. Checking in "Configure manually", OAuth2 is there. Click "Done", and it begins "Checking password", and never comes back.........

I know the Gmail account and password are valid, because I can get mail directly from Google.....

I'm at a loss...any suggestions would be appreciated.
creator: Richard.Ripley

title: VISUALIZZAZIONE MESSAGGI SPOSTATI NELLE CARTELLE PERSONALI
content: Non è più possibile visualizzare i messaggi (inviati o ricevuti) spostati nelle cartelle personali, nonostante ci sia ancora memoria sufficiente.
creator: lflavi.ca

title: Multiple folders created inbox-0,inbox-1 etc. after Thunderbird update and blank inbox creen after deleting email
content:
Mám stejný problém jako lidé tady. Neřešil někdo? https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/1foy7av/problem_thunderbird_creates_inbox1_2_3_folders/

Dokonce jsem přeinstaloval Thunderbird a vytvořil nový profil a za pár dní se otci problém objevil znovu. Úplně odstraňovat ho nechci, mají tam i profily ostatní členové rodiny. Ve zkratce: Po smazání "zmizí" pole s doručenou poštou a musím restartovat Thunderbird. Zároveň se vytvoří složka inbox-0,inbox-1 atd.

Poštu používá seznam.cz s POP3, takže naprosto standartní nastavení.
creator: tomaskoucky

title: How to set Thunderbird to delete emails older than a certain year only from the local computer, without doing anything on the server?

(not delete on server!!!) I would like to solve this with Gmail IMAP settings. Can someone describe how to do this? Thank you in advance for your help. Balazs
